location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: A Certificate Concerning the Sale of a Vessel, Signed by William Bruce, Assistant Resident at Bushire

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The item has suffered from heavy pest damage; two large holes in each folio have obscured a significant amount of text and much of the content is difficult to read as a result.

mods.abstract: A certificate of the sale of Gelaria Expiranceand her stores as a result of the vessel floundering. It was purchased by the late Shaik Nasser and is now in the possession of his son the Shiek Abdol Russool [Shaikh ‘Abd al-Rasūl Khān].
